s;Sal;You too...|You're in trouble with the law often?
s;Poppy;Truthfully? Sure.|You're no snitch, are ya?
s;Poppy;Well, I got business, blondie.|Until we meet again! Or... whatever you knightly types say.
s;Sal;Whew... I feel a bit stronger now...

name: LandrosTalk
_source: s;Landros;Commander.|Nice weather for a nice day, isn't it?
s;Landros;I saw the Sagemaster hurried off.|I take it he's late?
s;Landros;Hah! He might be our leader...|But, he sure is a scatterbrain.|He's fortunate to have you.
s;Sal;I suppose so, but I am fortunate to have him.|He let me stay in Encantis, when I hadn't anyone in my corner.
s;Landros;I didn't mean to disparage him, of course...
s;Sal;I'm sure he'd agree with you!|He might be unfocused at times, but he's honest.|In some aspects, like yourself.
s;Landros;I... can't entirely argue with that.

name: ManTalk
_source: s;OldMan1;Oh, you look like a valiant warrior!
s;OldMan1;Could I interest you in a weapon?|An axe, from my youth as a soldier!|Now... I can barely lift it.
s;OldMan1;I'm sorry, lass.|This axe was my pride and joy.
s;Sal;Well, I suppose for the price...|I'll make use of it... thanks.
s;OldMan1;I'm sorry, lass.|That's not enough money...
s;OldMan1;Well, I'm sure someone will want this...

name: House1
_source: s;Sal;I wish I had your energy, kid.
s;YoungGirl;Haha! That's just what ma says!
s;YoungGirl;Take this with you!|It tastes terrible!

name: WomanTalk
_source: s;Girl1;You seem to have it all together...|But, I'm no use at cooking, or sewing, or much...|What do you think I should do?
choice;Advice;How to get stronger?;Become a priestess,Become a knight,Become a housewife
s;Girl1;I suppose that could work? You pray?
s;Girl1;Oh yeah... I suppose you are a knight yourself?
s;Sal;Indeed, I get to help those who can't help themselves.
s;Girl1;Yeah... Yeah! That sounds great!|Thank you, miss! Say... take this with you!|It's a little healing salve!
s;Girl1;You'll need it in all your hero duty!|Plus... you made me realise what I should do... so, thank you!
s;Girl1;O-Oh... Right...|I was expecting something a little more... uplifting, I guess.
s;Sal;It's easier than my job, let me tell you.
s;Girl1;I suppose I'd better find a man for myself...

name: SanjayKesley
_source: s;Kesley;Sir Sanjay! Are you ready for the coronation event?
s;Kesley;Well... You don't look super happy...|Oh! I know, I know!|Your cat died? So sad!
s;Kesley;Oh... You're stressed about the mission later!|I can come with you and help!
s;Sanjay;Hush... about... that...|Honestly, you're a liability, I wouldn't want you there.
s;Kesley;Sir Sanjay! You must be joking!
s;Kesley;I'm not a liability! I swear!|I'll show you...
s;Sal;A little harsh, wouldn't you say?
s;Sanjay;She really grinds my patience to dust.
s;Sal;I'm just saying, a little kindness...|It can go a long way, you know.
s;Sal;Seems you're not a hospitable type...
s;Sanjay;Sorry, I have a lot on my mind.|I'd rather not have her distracting me.|With her screams and ramblings...
s;Sal;Well... enjoy your day.|If that were even possible...

name: AerialTalk
_source: s;Aerial;There's a sign sayin' to take one.
s;Sal;You trust a random basket of apples...
s;Aerial;Tasted pretty great to me.|No need to be cynical, Sal. These people are decent.
s;Sal;I'll try one then...|Hm... quite sweet...
s;Aerial;Good, right?|A nice treat that won't ruin my bulk buildin'!
s;Aerial;Well, maybe not at the moment.|I'll put it aside until sunset.
s;Sal;I respect your dedication.|Perhaps we'll train together!

name: SmokeTalk
_source: s;Sal;Smoke, what are you doing round here?
s;Smoke;Oh! Wow! Commander Sal! Fancy seeing you here!
s;Sal;Well, we're all... here...?|What's gotten into you?
s;Smoke;You ever hear about the knight who was made of beef?
s;Sal;Do you need medical attention?|Did you trip and hit your head?
s;Sal;I'll pretend I didn't hear that.
s;Smoke;What about the knight who was always sure of himself?
s;Smoke;They call him, Sir Tain-|Wait! Commander!

name: NakoTalk
_source: s;Nako;Hello, Sal...|These church gardens are so... peaceful.|The flowers are beautiful, aren't they?
s;Nako;I suppose, as a soldier, you might not...
s;Sal;Yes, I send people to early graves.|Those who deserve it, Nako.
s;Nako;Of course! I didn't mean to suggest-
s;Sal;I've made my peace with that.
s;Nako;We both protect those we care about...
s;Sal;My way just... requires more blood spilled.
s;Nako;I'll... just think about this flowers.|You should too! I don't wish to see you go grey before I do!
s;Sal;Heh... I'll focus one petal at a time.

name: PiknoTalk
_source: s;Sal;You realise he's only just left?
s;Sal;I order you to! You've got hours until he's back!
s;Pikno;A command from a superior officer...|I suppose I must comply...
s;Pikno;Now... to plan what to do...

name: MaroTalk
_source: s;Maro;Commander Sal! I've been browsing the stock here!
s;Maro;Their weapon maintenance is... serviceable.|I thought I'd let you know.
s;Maro;I... heard the Sagemaster gave you some funds...
s;Maro;Ah! Well... I'd like a new lance, is all.
s;Sal;'ll see what I can do.|Though, this money is for the squadron.
s;Maro;If someone else is more deserving... I understand.|Do what feels right.

name: Intro
_source: s;Sagemaster;It's so dark... Where are the street torches?|If only I remembered my torch staff...
s;Sagemaster;Ah... A warlock!|I take it you were at the magic exhibition?
s;Lazir;So I was!|The crystal will revolutionise magic...

s;Sagemaster;I'm glad you were impressed.|Could you... erm, lend me a hand?|I can hardly see in front of me... If only I had a light crystal, right?|Could you lead me to the inn, if you would be so kind?
s;Lazir;That crystal of yours...|It wants to come home with me, you see!
s;Sagemaster;Hm, I'm surprised you didn't try and pickpocket it...|I'd have been less the wiser...
s;Sagemaster;Because now... I can just shout...|Help! Help me!
s;Lazir;Shhh! Or I'll shut you up myself!
s;Sagemaster;Is that a threat? How ill-advised... Observe my flames!
s;Lazir;Hueueueue! Not so loud now!|Now... hand it over...|Then I might be so kind... as to give your voice back!
s;Lazir;Oh Sagechatter! Thank you!|Though... The deal is off!
s;Lazir;This thing caused quite a stir...|Some would pay great amounts for it...|Others would pay great money for it to be destroyed...|This knowledge will end with you!|Scurry forth, men!
s;Lazir;Now... ta-rah!|I'll be back for that precious little thing of yours!|Men! Pry it from his hands!
s;Sal;Distant shouting... and the Sagemaster is late...|I'd best go scour the streets.
s;Nako;Oh dear... we have to investigate immediately!
s;Sal;Heal staff at the ready, Nako.
s;Sal;Alright, we'd best find the Sagemaster...
s;SoldierBlue;By orders of the Aurelian guard, back into your lodging.
s;Sal;We're looking for the Sagemaster.|He's likely in danger.
s;SoldierBlue;Back! We have an incident to be resolved!
s;Sal;This whole ruse seems awfully familiar...|What kind of soldier, are you?
s;SoldierBlue;R-Respect my authority ma'am!|Or I will be forced to harm you!
s;Sal;You're on the take alright...|The question is... whose?
s;SoldierBlue;Th-that's it! Everyone, consider these fools as enemies too!

name: Outro
_source: s;Sal;I suppose I should handle the rooms now...

name: UnsilencedSagemaster
_source: s;Sagemaster;I... can speak!|Now... you fools will be punished.|Come! Attack me now!

name: SalSanjay
_source: speak;Sal;Scolding your subordinate, yet you sculk in the night.|Reading your weapon on me.;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Sanjay;I should have known you would become a thorn in my side.;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Why are you colluding with these thugs?;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Sanjay;Is it not obvious? A guard's pay is fine enough..|But, there are always ways to make more...;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Then, let your greed be your undoing!;;;boss_convo_right

name: FightSanjay
_source: speak;Sanjay;Make this easy for me and stay right... there.;;;boss_convo_left

name: SalSagemaster
_source: s;Sal;You're safe now...|Though, you look in pain...
s;Sal;Well, they'll all pay for this!
s;Sagemaster;I'm so glad to see you...|Oh! What a fool I was...
s;Sal;I told you that you'd need my help.
s;Sagemaster;Aurelia has been so hospitable until then...|I'll discuss this further when we're done.
s;Sal;On it, let's end this madness!

name: Outro
_source: s;Sal;Oh... Sagemaster...|Please, don't be so reckless in the future.
s;Sagemaster;I may be a ruler... But, I was genuinely afraid...|Foiled... by a simple silencing spell...
s;Sagemaster;A dark mage... He took the crystal...
s;Sal;In the wrong hands, this could be...
s;Sagemaster;Fortunately, all I had on me was the runt of the litter.|The truly dangerous sort would be back home.
s;Sagemaster;Besides, to elicit greater magical energy would require more research.|I doubt that druid would know where to start.
s;Sal;Regardless, we should sleep.|The coronation is bright and early tomorrow...
s;Sagemaster;Please, lead the way to the inn...|Though, I can't promise I'll sleep well...
s;Sal;I think we're safe...|I think there's been enough ruckus for the time being.|They wouldn't dare attack you, now we're here.|Now, let's go.
s;Elias;Father, I swear... i will make you proud...
s;EmelinePrincess;I'm fine, but why are you awake?
s;Elias;I could ask the same of you.
s;Elias;As am I, I know I have large shoes to fill...|I also... I miss father... He's just... gone.
s;EmelinePrincess;Oh, Eli... I miss him too...|But... I know you'll meet and exceed his standards.
s;Elias;I hope you're right...|I wish for people of all nations to bask in the golden rays of the Goddess.|I will do my best to match him, maybe even surpass him.
speak;Elias;Of course, I wish for you to help me every step of the way, Emmie.|I know I cannot do this alone.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Me? I'm not sure what I can do...|You'd be wasting your time with me...

speak;Elias;Come now, we're only as good as the people we surround ourselves with.|Plus, you're my sister, I know you better than anyone.|Even if the future is uncertain, I am certain that you'll brighten it up.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Oh Elias... I'll try my hardest...
s;Elias;That's the spirit! Plus... we can find you a suitor during the festivities!|There might be some real catches for you!
s;EmelinePrincess;Oh brother... don't tease!|Besides, you should find yourself a queen first!
s;Elias;Well, I suppose both can be true.|Though, it is late... I really should get to sleep.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Father, I'll help him every step...

name: New Event
_source: s;Eff;Not a moment too soon, apparently...
s;Xeconis;Well, it hasn't started yet, I wonder what he'll reveal...
s;Cornelius;Our time is too valuable, archbishop.
s;Jeremiah;Now, now, Cornelius.|We should keep the church in the know.|Perhaps we can glean understanding of the Goddess?

s;Sagemaster;Ahem, welcome one and all!|I would like to thank the Aurelian Aacademy for hosting this exhibition.|As well as all in attendance.|I am grateful I can demonstrate my discoveries to the soon-to-be king!
s;Elias;Thank you, Sagemaster.|I am excited to have my horizons broadened!
s;Sagemaster;Indeed, I would also like to thank emperor Jevil of Palushin.|As well as archbishop Jeremiah, of the Aurelian church.
s;Jevil;Heh, go ahead. Blow my mind, Sagemaster!

s;Sagemaster;You may think of tomes as the only conduit for magic...|However! Observe... a crystal imbued with the arcane power of fire!|A catalyst which can be used regardless of any spiritual and magical prowess...|Do I have anyone less magically gifted, who is willing to volunteer?
s;Xeconis;I could do so...|I'm basically unable to use a tome to save my life...
s;Sagemaster;Come up here, sir! What is your name?
s;Sagemaster;Don't be shy, Xeconis, come here.
s;Xeconis;Hm... It is rather warm...|I feel the essence...
s;Sagemaster;The power of these stones...|Allowed an ordinary soldier to cast flames!|Think of the applications! Families needn't go cold in the winter!|Food cooked in the wilds...
s;Xeconis;Ah... of course, here you go.|Thank you... Sagemaster. It meant a lot to do that.
s;Sagemaster;Magic is a marvel... I'm glad you enjoyed it.
s;Sagemaster;Now, while this is still new... We are refining our process on more types of crystals...|Thunder... wind... ice...|Even the divine light, so you can always find your way!
s;Elias;Sagemaster... This is all so fascinating.|Might I ask... Light magic is the force of the Goddess...|How does that relate to these stones?
s;Sagemaster;Ah, your Highness... That, I am not sure...|I mean no disrespect, but my inquiry rarely intersects with the Goddess...
s;Jeremiah;Where else could light magic originate from?
s;Sagemaster;Well, we have to not hold too many assumptions when researching...|I am an open-minded man, after all.
s;Elias;So... it could be something else entirely?
s;Jeremiah;Cornelius, calm yourself... He means no offence.|This provides an opportunity to reveal the secrets of her light!|Perhaps these stones are vestiges of her power!
s;Elias;Indeed... we may gain better insight into her grace!
s;Cornelius;Or hear more blathering about how she is a fraud?!|I won't stand for this drivel!
s;Sagemaster;Now... where were we? More demonstrations?
s;Xeconis;I'm going to have to keep closer tabs on that one...|I have a sick feeling in my stomach.
s;Xeconis;No, it's not the bear meat...
s;Max;You sure? But, yeah... I understand...
